summary: More than 2.7 million miles of pipeline transport the natural gas, oil, and other hazardous liquids the nation needs. The Departments of Homeland Security and Transportation share responsibility for safeguarding these pipelines along with pipeline operators. In 2010, DHS's Transportation Security Administration issued a plan to coordinate pipeline security incident responses among government agencies and with the private sector. However, TSA has not updated this...
title: Critical Infrastructure Protection: Key Pipeline Security Documents Need to Reflect Current Operating Environment
